Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: Sprig and Green Garden Shoppe

This herb shop features herbs of every shape, size, and color drying from pegs along the ceiling. A few tables are set up along the west wall to advertise wares: trinkets, pendants, oils, and lotions. Rows of open barrels and various ceramic and glass jars on shelves hold many supplies here useful for their healing properties as well as providing flavor to one's cooking.

This herb shop features herbs of every shape, size, and color drying from pegs along the ceiling. A few tables are set up along the west wall to advertise wares. Rows of open barrels and various ceramic and glass jars on shelves hold many supplies here useful for their healing properties as well as providing flavor to one's cooking.

This herb shop features herbs of every shape, size, and color drying from pegs along the ceiling. A few tables are set up along the west wall to advertise wares: trinkets, pendants, oils, and lotions. Rows of open barrels and various ceramic and glass jars on shelves hold many supplies here useful for their healing properties as well as providing flavor to one's cooking.
a dark wooden door leading north
This dark wooden door leads to the north. $(parent-desc)
a pair of slatted doors leading south
A pair of arched wooden doors with slatted panels leading south open to the herb garden. $(parent-desc)
various barrels
Rows of various open barrels with many useful supplies and spices.
the ceiling

Thick, dark oak joists cross the ceiling about twelve feet overhead. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered and whitewashed. Pegs have been nailed into the joists and various herbs and flora have been hung on them to dry.
There seems to be a ceiling overhead in this dark room, supported by thick wooden beams.
Thick, dark wooden joists cross the ceiling about twelve feet overhead in this dim room. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered. Herbs and flowers hang from the joists.
Thick wooden joists cross the ceiling. They support wide wooden planks, which have been plastered and whitewashed. Herbs hang from pegs nailed into the joists.
There is a ceiling above your head in this dark room.
This dim room has a ceiling of thick, wooden beams supporting plastered planks.
the floor
The floor is made from smooth oak planks. The planks are old, but clean and well swept and shine from years of brisk scrubbing.
The floor of a dark room is made from smooth wooden planks.
The floor of the dim room is made from wooden planks. The old planks are smooth and clean.
The floor is made from smooth oak planks. The planks are old, but clean and well scrubbed.
The floor is made from smooth wooden planks.
The floor is made from smooth, old wooden planks.
various jars
Many jars line the shelves, made of ceramic, clay and glass. They hold useful herbs and spices.
the middle of the shop
The middle of the shop.
The middle of a dark shop.
The middle of the dim shop.
The middle of the shop.
The middle of a dark shop.
The middle of the dim shop.
wooden peg
A three-inch wooden peg that extends outward from a joist in the ceiling. Its use is for drying herbs and plants over time.
A wooden peg.
A three-inch wooden peg that extends outward from a joist in the ceiling.

A three-inch wooden peg that extends outward from a joist in the ceiling. Its use is for drying herbs and plants over time.

wooden peg
A three-inch wooden peg that extends outward from a joist in the ceiling. Its use is for drying herbs and plants over time.
A wooden peg.
A three-inch wooden peg that extends outward from a joist in the ceiling.
the wooden pegs
Three-inch wooden pegs that extend outward from a joist in the ceiling. Their use is for drying herbs and plants over time.
Wooden pegs.
Three-inch wooden pegs that extend outward from a joist in the ceiling.
north wall's shelf
The north wall's shelf, full of various ceramic and glass jars, and various other useful tools for gardening. There are some gardening shears laying here.
The north wall's shelf, full of various ceramic and glass jars and other things. There are some gardening shears laying here.
west wall's shelf
The west wall's shelf, full of various ceramic and glass jars, and various other useful tools for gardening.
The west wall's shelf, full of various ceramic and glass jars and other things.
east wall's shelf
The east wall's shelf, full of various ceramic and glass jars, and various other useful tools for gardening.
The east wall's shelf, full of various ceramic and glass jars and other things.
shelves
On the north, west and east walls there are shelves for ceramic glass jars, and various useful gardening tools.
long table

The mahogany trestle table has a thick and unusually wide top with angled corners resting on two very robust trestles terminating in sledge feet and joined by a single center stretcher. With an excellent overhang at each end this table easily accommodates the herb shop's needs and has the typically splendid mahogany color and patina. This table reaches a full nine feet in length, three feet in width and stands roughly two and one half feet from the floor.
The long wooden table.

The mahogany trestle table easily accommodates the herb shop's needs and has the typically splendid mahogany color and patina. This table reaches a full nine feet in length, three feet in width and stands roughly two and one half feet from the floor.
long table

The pine trestle table has a thick and unusually wide top with angled corners resting on two very robust trestles terminating in sledge feet and joined by a single center stretcher. With an excellent overhang at each end this table easily accommodates the herb shop's needs and has the typically splendid pine color and patina. This table reaches a full nine feet in length, three feet in width and stands roughly two and one half feet from the floor.
The long wooden table.

The pine trestle table easily accommodates the herb shop's needs and has the typically splendid pine color and patina. This table reaches a full nine feet in length, three feet in width and stands roughly two and one half feet from the floor.
long table

The oak trestle table has a thick and unusually wide top with angled corners resting on two very robust trestles terminating in sledge feet and joined by a single center stretcher. With an excellent overhang at each end this table easily accommodates the herb shop's needs and has the typically splendid oak color and patina. This table reaches a full nine feet in length, three feet in width and stands roughly two and one half feet from the floor.
The long wooden table.

The oak trestle table easily accommodates the herb shop's needs and has the typically splendid oak color and patina. This table reaches a full nine feet in length, three feet in width and stands roughly two and one half feet from the floor.
long tables

The trestle tables have thick and unusually wide tops with angled corners resting on very robust trestles terminating in sledge feet and joined by center stretchers. With an excellent overhang at each end these tables easily accommodate the herb shop's needs and have the typically splendid color and patina of their respective woods. These tables reach a full nine feet in length, three feet in width and stand roughly two and one half feet from the floor.
The long wooden tables.

The trestle tables easily accommodate the herb shop's needs and have the typically splendid color and patina of their respective woods. These tables reach a full nine feet in length, three feet in width and stand roughly two and one half feet from the floor.
the eastern wall

The half-timbered eastern wall is constructed of dark, unpainted oak posts. The arch-braces rise from some of the larger posts, and curve slightly as they rise to support the ceiling beams. Recessed between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, whitewashed plaster. These panels are recessed about half an inch beyond the surrounding wooden frame. The wall is about twelve feet high. A small floral design has been painted on the walls with an amateur hand.
The half-timbered eastern wall of this dark room is constructed of wooden posts. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough plaster.

The close-studded, half-timbered eastern wall of this dim room is constructed of oak posts and diagonal braces, somewhat less than perfectly flat and square -- not all are of the same width, and some have slight curves or uneven surfaces. Between the wooden posts and braces are panels of rough, white plaster.
The half-timbered eastern wall is constructed of oak posts and panels of rough, white plaster. A simple floral pattern has been painted on the plaster pannels.
The eastern side of this dark room seems to be a wall, built of wood and plaster.
The half-timbered eastern wall of this dim room is constructed of wooden posts and panels of rough, white plaster.

the glazed casement windows
The glazed casement windows, roughly square, are set into the northern wall. They provide a view, through their small, blurry glass panes, of Strada di Guerra. Through the window:

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[M] EmitTo(\$actor, "You enter through the large wooden front door of the herb shop. Your senses are engulfed by the heady aromas of the herbs and flora filling the room."); return TRUE;
